mapper.select: select categoryseq as seq,field,duty,writer, title, writeDate, viewCount,rown from (select scrap.*, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as rown from scrap where category='industryStatus' and id=#{id}) cscrap inner join industryStatus on cscrap.categoryseq = industryStatus.seq where rown between #{start} and #{end}

select categoryseq as seq, division, title, writer, writeDate, viewCount,rown from (select scrap.*, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as rown from scrap where category='codeQuestion' and id=#{id}) cscrap inner join CodeQuestion on cscrap.categoryseq = CodeQuestion.seq where rown between #{start} and #{end}

select categoryseq as seq, title, location1, location2, capacity, writer, writeDate, state, rown from (select scrap.*, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as rown from scrap where category='project' and id=#{id}) cscrap inner join project on cscrap.categoryseq = project.seq where rown between #{start} and #{end}

select categoryseq as seq, title,writer, writeDate, viewCount, rown from (select scrap.*, row_number() over (order by seq desc) as rown from scrap where category='itNews' and id=#{id}) cscrap inner join itNews on cscrap.categoryseq = itNews.seq where rown between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from (select * from scrap where category=#{colum} and id=#{id}) cscrap inner join ${colum} on cscrap.categoryseq = ${colum}.seq
